Hello all,
 
Not sure if this is on topic for some of you. Apologies if I am
violating any of the list rules.
If you are in this region and if you think you should know JXTA and get
involved in JXTA-J2SE testing please attend.
 
As a coincidence, there was a proposal at jxta.org yesterday which I
would forward to this list for info.
The proposal is about starting a project which focuses on developing a
distributed testing framework using JUnit.
 
Pass on the following information to those who would be interested.
 
Regards,
 
Rajesh
JXTA SIG Bangalore
http://www.jxtabang.org <http://www.jxtabang.org/> 
 
*****************************
 
JXTA 2.0 - Ready for RealWorld?
 
JXTA Special Interest Group of Bangalore gladly announces the Second
Annual Meet to discuss JXTA-2 protocols and aims to evaluate the
progress done by various projects at jxta.org. Also at display would be
products that are collaborative and operate in a peer-to-peer network
which are now available for businesses.
 
JXTA Special Interest Group of Bangalore, http://www.jxtabang.org is
formed to encourage innovation in peer-to-peer computing using JXTA, a
Sun Microsystems sponsored Open Source Project http://www.jxta.org and
illustrate end users with the benefits of using peer-to-peer concepts in
their business application.
 
Date: 23rd May 2003
Time: 9.30 AM to 4.30 PM
 
Venue:
Satish Dhawan Auditorium,
National Science Seminar Complex,
Indian Institute of Science Campus,
BANGALORE, INDIA.
 
Cover Charge: Rs. 250
Rs.100 less for academic (students and faculty) registrations. Please
attach copy of academic ID card.
Rs.150 less for participants of previous meet.
 
Early Registration ends on 15th May 2003
Late fee after 15th May Rs.100
 
Tentative Program:
9.30-9.45                       Welcome
9.45-10.00                     Early Registrant Raffles
10.00-11.15                   Introduction to JXTA and JXTA 2.0 Update
11.15-11.30                   Tea Break 
11.30-12.30                   Products/Prototypes Demo
12.30-13.00                   Ongoing Research Projects 
 
13.00-13.30                   Lunch
 
13.30-14.30                   JXTA for J2ME (JXME) - A look at mobile
peers
14.30-15.00                   JXME Demo
15.00-15.30                   Products in the pipeline.
15.30-16.30                   Open Forum
 
PS: Final Agenda will be re-distributed to registrants before the event
date.
 
 
Program Highlights:
 
* Momentum by Inview Software - Witness real time collaboration with
their Shared Information Manager.
* Pic-Share Demo on Mobile Phone Emulators.
 
Registration Details:
 
Please email to events@... to send in your registration.
 
Cheques/DDs to reach the following address on or before 15th May along
with details like Name and Organization.
 
JXTA SIG Bangalore
C/o Zudha Information Technologies Pvt Ltd
No.227, 12th Cross,
Wilson Garden
Bangalore- 560027
 
Payment in favour of "JXTA SIG Bangalore"
 
Any other enquiries to be mailed to info@...
